heading: This Afternoon
text: Mostly sunny, except partly cloudy far south. Highs mainly in the mid upper 30s, around 40 in southeastern valleys, and some lower 30s in the Champlain Valley, and near the international border. Winds variable to north around 5 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Partly to mostly cloudy. Lows from the upper teens to mid 20s in areas south of Route 4, 5 to 15 above in northern areas, with northeastern cold hollows from zero to 5 below. Winds becoming light and variable.

heading: Friday
text: Increasing clouds north, Mostly cloudy south, with a rising chance of wintry mix in the afternoon, and a rising chance late in the north; 1 to 3 inches of snow in the south, mainly over high terrain, a trace to an inch north. Valley highs in the mid to upper 30s, with temperatures falling once precipitation begins. South to southeast winds 5 to 10 mph.
